item.title: GPT-2 Pretraining Implementation
item.description: A nano-GPT implementation with Pytorch Lightning. The goal is to have a clean building block for other research projects by containing just enough manual implementation do be easily modifiable, but also by using common tools to have a painless optimized training and nice monitoring. Its contains the code to train the model, prepare the dataset and run evals. This page also details results I got training on HF’s FineWeb-Edu. Code Repository
